mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, COMM_NUM, TITLE, CONTENT, USER_ID, COMM_DATE, COMM_CNT, REG_ID FROM(SELECT * FROM T_BEDU_COMM ORDER BY COMM_NUM DESC)) WHERE rnum >= #{page} AND 5 >= rnum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BEDU_QS( USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_CNT, QS_LIKE_CNT, QS_DATE, REG_DATE, REG_ID )VALUES( #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{qna_cnt}, #{qna_like_yn}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), #{reg_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT QS_BD_NUM AS qna_bd_num, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_CNT AS qna_cnt, QS_LIKE_CNT AS qna_like_yn, USER_ID, QS_DATE AS qna_date, REG_ID FROM T_BEDU_QS WHERE QS_BD_NUM = #{num}

SELECT QS_BD_NUM AS qna_bd_num, TITLE, CONTENT, QS_CNT AS qna_cnt, QS_LIKE_CNT AS qna_like_yn, USER_ID, QS_DATE AS qna_date, REG_ID FROM T_BEDU_QS
WHERE CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY QS_BD_NUM DESC
